ch0302_40_chiri/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you
come by to visit ol’ Rika?
ch0302_40_chiri/0101_0701_02_10:
Today deserves some extra effort! Let’s enjoy
a great day together!
ch0302_40_chiri/7101_0701_01_10:
Nahaha! What’s all this now? So many
people are takin’ notice of ol’ Rika today.
ch0302_40_chiri/7101_0701_02_10:
Thanks to my change in style, maybe
this beauty of mine is finally catching
people’s eye!
ch0302_40_chiri/7102_0701_01_10:
Whenever Palentine’s Day rolls around,
I see people who look so stiff, you’d think
they’re off to an interview.
ch0302_40_chiri/7102_0701_02_10:
In my heart, I’m always cheering for ’em to
hang in there.
ch0302_40_chiri/7103_0701_01_10: Hey, what kind of clothes do you like?
ch0302_40_chiri/7103_0701_02_10:
I tend to meet a lot of different people
through my work...
ch0302_40_chiri/7103_0701_03_10: So I know a lot of different fashion styles!
ch0302_40_chiri/7103_0701_04_10:
Oh, I know! Let me pick an outfit for you
sometime!
ch0302_40_chiri/7104_0701_01_10:
Back when I was coachin’ at Blueberry
Academy...
ch0302_40_chiri/7104_0701_02_10:
the League Club kids were always givin’ me
snacks. I loved it!
ch0302_40_chiri/7104_0701_03_10:
In short, giving someone sweets is a great
way to say thanks!
ch0302_40_chiri/7105_0701_01_10:
My hair doesn’t look half bad when it’s
down, right?
ch0302_40_chiri/7105_0701_02_10:
All right, here’s a question for ya,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0302_40_chiri/7105_0701_03_10:
Between my usual hairstyle and this one,
which do you like more?
ch0302_40_chiri/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, I’ve been looking for you! I wanted to
give you this.
ch0302_40_chiri/1701_0702_01_10: Keep this between you an’ me, OK?
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0701_01_10: My outfit today looks new and fresh, right?
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0701_02_10:
If I’m gonna go out, I want to enjoy myself
looking fancier than usual!
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0701_03_10:
I may be more beautiful than usual,
but don’t be too captivated, all right?
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0702_01_10:
People aren’t the only ones excited about my
new look.
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0702_02_10: Pokémon have been oddly playful with me.
ch0302_40_chiri/2501_0702_03_10:
But if I played with Pokémon in this outfit,
it’d get covered in dirt.
ch0302_40_chiri/2511_0701_01_10:
Palentine’s Day is a time to show others your
appreciation!
ch0302_40_chiri/2511_0701_02_10:
There are lots of ways to thank someone,
and I know it might be embarrassing to
share your feelings...
ch0302_40_chiri/2511_0701_03_10:
But once you decide to, you gotta see it
through! Just do your best!
ch0302_40_chiri/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve got people I’d like to thank too,
you know.
ch0302_40_chiri/2511_0702_03_10:
As part of the Elite Four, I’m always grateful
when challengers show me new possibilities.
ch0302_40_chiri/3001_0701_01_10:
Good mornin’! Want something sweet to
start off the day? It’ll really clear your
head!
ch0302_40_chiri/3003_0701_01_10:
When you walk, look straight ahead and
hold your chest out. Don’t lose when it
comes to heart!
ch0302_40_chiri/3005_0701_01_10:
Today was another rich, fulfilling day.
Thanks for spending it with me.
